item.title: Pakistan Areas Hit by Floods in 2022 Face Evacuation for Cyclone
item.description: Pakistan is bracing for a new threat from a cyclone, which is expected to make landfall in the country’s southern Sindh province on Thursday. The cyclone, which has been named Gulab, is expected to bring heavy rains and strong winds, which could cause widespread flooding and damage.
